Detailed Description

Answer class

A single answer or click of an option for a survey.

Copyright 2013 University of Washington, School of Nursing. http://opensource.org/licenses/BSD-3-Clause

See note below at afterFind: no timezone modification is done to 'modified' field due to the overhead of getting the proper timezone; saving is easy because it's just the current time in GMT, but converting to local time on find is another matter. Because currently no one is using the modified fields (except to compare to other modified fields for the same user), we're letting this slide. --- gsbarnes

Answer::analysisValueForSessionAndQuestion ( $  session_id,
$  question_id 
)

Return analsysis value for a question NULL for absolutely no answer a String for textbox questions an Int analysis value for radio buttons

checkboxes: Returns an array of all options for which the most recent state is active/selected. May return an empty array. key = option ID; value = text from combo, or null if non-combo

other controls undefined
